abstracts.cdata!:
The credit will assist in financing: (1)
            credit extended by Caisse Nationale de Credit Agricole
            (CNCA) to farmers for the purchase of seasonal inputs, of
            draft animals and animal-drawn farm implements, and to rural
            cooperatives for the purchase of scales; (ii) an expansion
            of extension services; and (iii) technical assistance to CNCA.
